MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KA1 postcode area of Kilmarnock. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10.28am to carry out repairs to an underground cable at Treeswoodhead Road due to third party damage and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.37am on Monday 15th February 2021.
